name: Sport HomeRun Matchup: Pop the Balls
name_original: Sport HomeRun Matchup: Pop the Balls
description:
Sport HomeRun Matchup is the crazy chain reaction game that has already had millions and millions of levels played since it was introduced early this year. Come join the fun!

• Simple Objective: "Pop" all ball with a limited # of taps
• Full Retina & iPhone 5 support!
• New PowerUps! will help you get through the hard levels!
• FREE Hints EVERY DAY!

Come join the fun
